hint.text: Use the formula for an isothermal irreversible change and note that \(q=-w\). Find the value of q.

solution.text:
For an isothermal irreversible change. \(q =\;- w = p_e(V_f - V_i)\)
\(\implies q =\;- w = _{{j-3}}_\;(_{l}_ - _{k}_)\)
\(\implies q =\;- w = _{{j-3}}_\;(_{{l-k}}_)\)
\(\implies q =\;- w = _{{(j-3)*(l-k)}}_\) litre-atm

content.text: _{k}_ litres of an ideal gas at a pressure of _{j}_ atm expands isothermally against a external pressure of _{{j-3}}_ atm until its total volume is _{l}_ litres. How much heat is absorbed and during the expansion?
